item.title: Hover cars, branded content and Guanxi
item.description: It’s been a star-studded day at the Cannes Lions International Festival of Creativity, with creative grandes dames Vivienne Westwood and Annie Leibowitz both sending the audience into a tweeting frenzy at the Palais des Festivals. (Westwood’s most-buzzed about quote, “if your ideas don’t make the world better - they are useless,” certainly chimes with a lot of the other Cannes conversation this week). But the prevailing theme for Tuesday was China: the world’s most populous nation and third-largest ad market.
